item.description:
• Hello Conscious Creators!

    • What new reality do you want to create for yourself in 2013?

      Set some NEW YEARS INTENTIONS. Let's get together to discuss setting intentions for what we want to see happen for us this year.

      Join us in a discussion to expand your beliefs and live more consciously! We meet to share philosophies, ideas and connect with others who enjoy exploring endless possibilities, seeing all our experiences as a valuable life lesson to create the change we desire.

      Join us in connecting with others who enjoy exploring endless possibilities, seeing all our experiences as a valuable life lesson and creating the change we desire.

      We will be meet from 7:00pm-8:30pm.
      See you there!
      Please call for if you are joining us for the first time.
      Ellen
      Organizer
      617-750-4830


      Â

group.name: The North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Moving Forward - Manifesting a Better Tomorrow
